TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatisticFormula extends System.Object

summary.span: 计算统计公式。

span.span: Calculates statistical formulas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式可以松散分为以下类别： 分发，包括反分发;测试;和基本统计公式。Formulas can be loosely grouped into the following categories: distributions, including inverse distributions; tests; and basic statistical formulas. 每个组具有其输入和返回值相关的共同特征。Each group has common characteristics with respect to their input and return values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova (double probability, string inputSeriesNames);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova(float64 probability, string inputSeriesNames) cil managed
Public Function Anova (probability As Double, inputSeriesNames As String) As AnovaResult
public: System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AnovaResult ^ Anova(double probability, System::String ^ inputSeriesNames);
member this.Anova : double * string -> System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult

param.name: probability
param.span: alpha 值，其表示假设被否定的概率。

span.span: The alpha value, which is the probability that the hypothesis is rejected.
The allowable range is 0-1.

param.name: inputSeriesNames
param.span: 以逗号分隔的输入序列名列表。

span.span: A comma-delimited list of input series names.

summary.span: 执行 ANOVA 检验以确定在两组或更多组数据的平均值之间是否存在统计方面的重大差异。

span.span: Performs an ANOVA test to determine whether there is a statistically significant difference between the mean values of two or more groups of data.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ANOVA 测试用于测试的数据的两个或多个组的方式之间的差异。An ANOVA test is used to test the difference between the means of two or more groups of data. 必须指定的序列数据的两个或多个组，而且每个序列必须具有相同数量的数据点;否则，将引发异常。Two or more groups of series data must be specified, and each series must have the same number of data points; otherwise, an exception will be raised. 如果指定的输入的序列中不存在方法调用时，将引发异常。If a specified input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public double BetaFunction (double m, double n);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 BetaFunction(float64 m, float64 n) cil managed
Public Function BetaFunction (m As Double, n As Double) As Double
public: double BetaFunction(double m, double n);
member this.BetaFunction : double * double -> double

span.span: The first value for the beta function.
The second value for the beta function.

summary.span: 返回两个给定值的 beta 函数值。

span.span: Returns the beta function value for two given values.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示两个给定值的 beta 函数。

span.span: A value that represents the beta function for the two given values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回由指定的两个给定值的 beta 函数值`m`和`n`。This method returns the beta function value for two given values that are specified by `m` and `n`.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Correlation (string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Correlation(string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Correlation (firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Correlation(System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);
member this.Correlation : string * string -> double

span.span: The first input series name.
The second input series name.

summary.span: 返回两个数据序列的相关值。

span.span: Returns the correlation value for two data series.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示两个数据序列之间的相关。

span.span: A value that represents the correlation between two data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相关度量值缩放可以独立于的度量单位的两个数据集之间的关系。Correlation measures the relationship between two data sets that are scaled to be independent of the unit of measurement. 方法返回除以其标准方差，该产品的两个数据集的协方差和始终范围为-1 到 1。The method returns the covariance of two data sets divided by the product of their standard deviations, and always ranges from -1 to 1. 使用相关性来确定是否两个范围的数据迁移结合了起来。即，是否与较大值的其他 （正相关） 相关联的一组较大值、 是否与其他 （负关联的） 的较大值相关联的一组值较小或两个集合中的值是否不相关的 （相关性接近零）。Use correlation to determine whether two ranges of data move together; that is, whether large values of one set are associated with large values of the other (positive correlation), whether small values of one set are associated with large values of the other (negative correlation), or whether values in both sets are unrelated (correlation near zero). 如果指定的输入的序列不存在时方法调用的序列集合中，将引发异常。If a specified input series does not exist in the series collection at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown. 如果指定的序列不具有相同数目的数据点，则也将引发异常。An exception will also be raised if the specified series do not have the same number of data points.

summary.span: 返回 F 累积分布函数的反函数。

span.span: Returns the inverse of the F cumulative distribution.

returns.span: F 分布反函数中的 值。

span.span: A value from the inverse F distribution function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回为给定的 F 分布概率 F 的值。This method returns the F value for the given F distribution probability. 可以在比较两个数据集中的可变程度 F 测试中使用 F 分布。The F distribution can be used in an F-test that compares the degree of variability in two data sets. 此方法可能返回一个异常，具体取决于参数值。This method may return an exception depending on the parameter values.

exception.span: 状况：由于受限，无法使用指定参数值继续计算。

span.span: Condition: Cannot continue calculation using specified parameter values because of limitation.

span.span: A value from the inverse standard normal cumulative distribution function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回为给定的 F 分布概率 F 的值。This method returns the F value for the given F distribution probability. 假定该分布的平均值为 0 （零） 和标准偏差为 1。It is assumed that the distribution has a mean of 0 (zero) and a standard deviation of one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于计算序列中存储的点的平均值 （平均值）。Use this method to calculate the mean (that is, the average) of the points stored in a series. 如果指定的输入的序列中不存在方法调用时，将引发异常。If the specified input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown.

span.span: A value that represents the median.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来计算序列中存储的点的中值。Use this method to calculate the median of the points stored in a series. 中值是一个示例集，其中一半成员是占用更多空间，一半成员都是大小较小的中间值。The median is the middle value of a sample set, where half of the members are greater in size and half the members are lesser in size. 如果指定的输入的序列中不存在方法调用时，将引发异常。If the specified input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown.
